page.title: 08An arable farm, Lullington
page.content: Grangewood Farm is situated 2.7 km north-east of Lullington. It covers a total of 300 acres and the average field size is 25 acres. Two brothers own and manage the farm, helped by one man. They grow 66 acres of potatoes and 120 acres of barley. The rest is mainly winter wheat. A small area of grass is set aside to make hay for the family's 2 horses. The crops are all sold, often at different times of the year to ensure a good cash flow. The amount of machinery is large and includes a combine harvester, tractors, ploughs, a potato harvester and a rotary cultivator.
